I'm Suraj Keshari. I love to code and collaborate with the team. I've made a lot of projects ranging from Frontend apps to Backend. I've been working on web development for a year long and have gained significant amount of the technical issues solving experience. I love to be in sync with new technologies and spent my leisure time learning them. I'm a life-long learner.

Achievements

2021 - 2nd Quarter
Projects Making
NodeJs && ExpressJs

I've made about 7 to 8 MEN(MongoDB, Express and NodeJs) projects where I make use of various concepts such as AJAX call, Rest APIs, templating language(hbs). ORM(mongoose), SocketIO and the list goes on. My projects include Secure Login System, Messaging App, Video Calling App, REST API app, Basic 3 Page Express Website, Blog Webapp(Private), etc are some MEN projects.

2021 - 1st Quarter
LEARNING
NodeJs && ExpressJs

I've upgraded myself to Mode and Express technologies. During the learning phase, I've learnt tons of concepts such as how the server-client relation is configured, how the server sehds the response to the client, AJAX concepts, REST API concepts, various useful npm packages such as jwt, ORM(mongoose), Templating Languages(hbs) and the list goes on. Now, I'm finally a full stack web developer with JavaScript in both frontend and backend.

2020 - 4th Quarter
LEARNING & Project Making
ReactJs

I've upgraded myself to React technologies. During the learning phase, I've learnt both Class-based components and functional components. I've made one react and php based 4-Page Single Page Web Application hosted online at here

2020 - 3rd Quarter
LEARNING & Project Making
SASS && PHP

I'm upgrading myself to different technologies because they make our task easy and efficient. Sass,preprocessor of CSS and Php being preprocessor of HTML. They help us do things more programmatically and that's what I love about them. I've made so many projects using sass and php refer my github account for reference. I've also made my own blog website using html, sass, JavaScript, php and Mysql.

2020 - 2nd Quarter
LEARNING & Project Making
HTML,CSS,JavaScript

I've learned HTML,CSS and JavaScript from scratch to the end from the MDN documentation. At this phase, I knew only the frontend part of Vanilla JavaScript, core concept of CSS and HTML. I've not entered into any JavaScript Frameworks yet. I've made many games and web projects using these technologies. Dragon game, car racing game, image gallery javascript app are some examples of my javascript basic projects.

2020 - 1st Quarter
LEARNING
Python, Flask, Django

I've learned Python, Flask and Django. During this quarter, I've learnt about python various concepts such as decorators, generators, list comprehension along with the fundamental ones. I've also entered into its frameworks. First I've learned the flask and then django. I've made 2 to 3 projects , but unfortunately I lost all of them because of some issues with my linux OS. Despite problems, I still have the knowledge of these technologies and can use them whenever necessary.

2019 - 4th Quarter
LEARNING & Project Making
Linux and C++

I've learned C++ from scratch to the end and also the Debian based Kali linux. At this phase, I learned about how the linux system work along with its useful commands. In linux system, I've made various OOPs based Cpp Basic Projects which includes uses of inheritance, polymorphism, abstraction and encapsulation and even the template concepts.

2019 - 2nd & 3rd Quarter
LEARNING & Project Making
C Language & DSA

C language is my second programming language. I've learned it from scratch to the end. At this phase, I learned about how the porgramming logic is to be applied. I got to know about the working of the codes that I'm writing. I understood the DSA concepts such as stack, queue, linked list,trees, graphs. I've revamp the concepts that I've learned in B language(QBASIC) in C language. The actual start of my programming career is from the C language.

2010 - 2015
LEARNING & Program Making
B Language - QBASIC

B language (QBASIC) is my first ever programming language that I've come acreoss and this help me to understand behind the scenes that are going in the code. Right from my childhood, I started leanring programming even if the level of code is not that of high standard. However, I still learned a lot of programming concepts such as for..loop, if conditionals, recursion and many basic concepts. I cannot say that I made projects rather that were QBASIC programs namely finding prime numbers, desigining the pattern, reversing strings and whole lots of other things. My childhood was fun only because of programming. Thanks to Programming.
